snippet.title: 8874 - Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
A climatic puzzle-platformer, side-scrolling adventure - 4Q of 2021 on PC!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1544860?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=organic 

Wiktor - young, insecure and the reserved boy wakes up in the foggy, seemingly abandoned place, where things are not always what they seem...
Guide him during his puzzle-platformer, side-scrolling adventure, discover forgotten Slavic legends, and find things that nazis left buried after World War II.


Join our Discord and chat about 8874:https://discord.gg/XSvDn5e3Zp  

Through platforming elements, challenging puzzles and characters met, slowly uncover the boy's purpose in the world he found himself in.
Discover beautiful and magical polish landscapes touched by the Third Reich during the Second World War. Help Wiktor survive encounters with creatures that inhabit the forest.
Dive deep into a dark world filled with magical creatures and secrets for you to discover.


8874 was appreciated on Pixel Awards 2018 getting Rookie of The Year and Audience Awards.


Stay tuned.
#8874 #indiegame
